mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT( PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_CONTENT, PRODUCT_STOCK, PRODUCT_CATEGORY, MEMBER_ID ) values( #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productContent}, #{productStock}, #{productCategory}, #{memberId} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID DESC
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR PRODUCT_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName}, PRODUCT_PRICE = #{productPrice}, PRODUCT_CONTENT = #{productContent}, PRODUCT_STOCK = #{productStock}, PRODUCT_CATEGORY = #{productCategory}, PRODUCT_UPDATE = SYSDATE, MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
